title: Kyra Sedgwick
itunes:title: Kyra Sedgwick
itunes:subtitle: Kyra Sedgwick [The Closer, Brooklyn Nine-Nine, Call Your Mother] joins Anna to talk about her new sitcom Call Your Mother, Shakespeare, meeting Kevin Bacon, a life-changing poundcake recipe, collecting troll dolls, directing, obsessive thinking, figuring
description:
Kyra Sedgwick [The Closer, Brooklyn Nine-Nine, Call Your Mother] joins Anna to talk about her new sitcom Call Your Mother, Shakespeare, meeting Kevin Bacon, a life-changing poundcake recipe, collecting troll dolls, directing, obsessive thinking, figuring out what makes you happy and more. Later in the episode Anna is joined again by author, Doctor of Human Sexuality, and host of the popular podcast Sex with Emily, Dr. Emily Morse. 

Learn more about Dr. Emily Morse at sexwithemily.com and listen to her podcast. Also be sure to check out Dr. Morse’s new MasterClass, Sex and Communication.

ThredUp Get the styles you love at a fraction of the price. You’ll look and feel good with thredUP! And for Unqualified listeners, here’s an exclusive offer just for you: Get an extra 30% off your first order at thredUP.com/anna. Terms apply.

True Crime Obsessed True Crime Obsessed is for anyone who’s interested in true crime, but also loves to laugh. Oh, and don’t worry, the humor never comes at the expense of the victim or the crime – Patrick and Gillian aren’t monsters.  True Crime Obsessed is a super fun and easy listen. Find True Crime Obsessed wherever you listen to podcasts.

Tushy The BRAND NEW Hello Tushy 3.0 modern bidet attachment is here to level the playing field. It’s stylish, eco-friendly, easy to install, and affordable!Go to hellotushy.com/ANNA get 10% off your order and FREE shipping

Turbotax Live Whether you want to file with the help of an expert or let an expert do the filing for you, TurboTax Live tax experts are here to help, giving you the confidence to know that your one-of-a-kind, uniquely you taxes are done right. Intuit TurboTax Live

BetterHelp This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and [Unqualified] listeners get 10% off their first month at  betterhelp.com/FARIS join the over one Million people who have taken charge of their mental health with the help of an experienced BetterHelp professional.
